DataMaintenance.deleteCustomerTaxrate: DELETE FROM customer_taxrate WHERE cx_tx_id = ? AND cx_c_id = ?
DataMaintenance.selectAccountPermission: SELECT AP_ACL FROM ACCOUNT_PERMISSION WHERE AP_CA_ID = ? ORDER BY ap_acl DESC LIMIT 1
DataMaintenance.selectCompany: SELECT CO_SP_RATE FROM COMPANY WHERE CO_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.selectCompanyAddress: SELECT ad_line2, ad_id FROM address, company WHERE ad_id = co_ad_id AND co_id = ?
DataMaintenance.selectCustomer: SELECT C_EMAIL_2 FROM CUSTOMER WHERE C_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.selectCustomerAddress: SELECT ad_line2, ad_id FROM address, customer WHERE ad_id = c_ad_id AND c_id = ?
DataMaintenance.selectCustomerTaxrate: SELECT cx_tx_id FROM customer_taxrate WHERE cx_c_id = ?
DataMaintenance.selectExchange: SELECT COUNT(ex_id) FROM exchange WHERE ex_desc LIKE '%LAST UPDATED%'
DataMaintenance.selectFinancial: SELECT COUNT(fi_co_id) FROM financial WHERE fi_co_id = ? AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM fi_qtr_start_date) = 1
DataMaintenance.selectNewsXref: SELECT nx_ni_id FROM news_xref WHERE nx_co_id = ?
DataMaintenance.selectSecurity: SELECT S_EXCH_DATE FROM SECURITY WHERE S_SYMB = ?
DataMaintenance.selectTaxRate: SELECT TX_NAME FROM TAXRATE WHERE TX_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.selectWatchItemListCount: SELECT COUNT(wi_wl_id) FROM watch_item, watch_list WHERE wl_c_id = ? AND wi_wl_id = wl_id
DataMaintenance.selectWatchItemMax: SELECT max(WI_S_SYMB) FROM WATCH_ITEM WHERE WI_WL_ID = ? AND WI_S_SYMB != ? AND WI_S_SYMB != ? AND WI_S_SYMB != ?
DataMaintenance.selectWatchItemSymbol: SELECT wi_s_symb FROM watch_item, watch_list WHERE wl_c_id = ? AND wi_wl_id = wl_id ORDER BY wi_s_symb ASC LIMIT 1
DataMaintenance.selectWatchListMax: SELECT max(WL_ID) FROM WATCH_LIST WHERE WL_C_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.updateAccountPermission: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PERMISSION SET AP_ACL = ? WHERE AP_CA_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.updateAddress: UPDATE address SET ad_line2 = ? WHERE ad_id = ?
DataMaintenance.updateCompany: UPDATE COMPANY SET CO_SP_RATE = ? WHERE CO_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.updateCustomer: UPDATE CUSTOMER SET C_EMAIL_2 = ? WHERE C_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.updateCustomerTaxrate: UPDATE customer_taxrate SET cx_tx_id = ? WHERE cx_c_id = ? AND cx_tx_id = ?
DataMaintenance.updateDailyMarket: UPDATE daily_market SET dm_vol = dm_vol + ? WHERE dm_s_symb = ? AND EXTRACT(DAY FROM dm_date) = ?
DataMaintenance.updateExchange: UPDATE EXCHANGE SET EX_DESC = ? WHERE EX_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.updateFinancial: UPDATE FINANCIAL SET FI_QTR_START_DATE = ? WHERE FI_CO_ID = ?
DataMaintenance.updateNewsItem: UPDATE news_item, news_xref SET ni_dts = ni_dts + INTERVAL '1' day WHERE ni_id = nx_ni_id AND nx_co_id = ?
DataMaintenance.updateSecurity: UPDATE SECURITY SET S_EXCH_DATE = ? WHERE S_SYMB = ?
DataMaintenance.updateTaxRate: UPDATE taxrate SET tx_rate = ? WHERE tx_id = ?
DataMaintenance.updateTaxRateName: UPDATE taxrate SET tx_name = ? WHERE tx_id = ?

TradeCleanup.insertTradeHistory: INSERT INTO TRADE_HISTORY (TH_T_ID, TH_DTS, TH_ST_ID) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
TradeCleanup.selectTrade: SELECT T_ID FROM TRADE WHERE T_ID >= ? AND T_ST_ID = ?
TradeCleanup.selectTradeRequest: SELECT TR_T_ID FROM TRADE_REQUEST ORDER BY TR_T_ID
TradeCleanup.updateTrade: UPDATE TRADE SET T_ST_ID = ?, T_DTS = ? WHERE T_ID = ?

TradeOrder.getACL: select AP_ACL from ACCOUNT_PERMISSION where AP_CA_ID = ? and AP_F_NAME = ? and AP_L_NAME = ? and AP_TAX_ID = ?
TradeOrder.getAccount1: select CA_NAME, CA_B_ID, CA_C_ID, CA_TAX_ST from CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT where CA_ID = ?
TradeOrder.getAccount2: select CA_BAL from CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT where CA_ID = ?
TradeOrder.getBroker: select B_NAME from BROKER where B_ID = ?
TradeOrder.getCharge: select CH_CHRG from CHARGE where CH_C_TIER = ? and CH_TT_ID = ?
TradeOrder.getCommissionRate: select CR_RATE from COMMISSION_RATE where CR_C_TIER = ? and CR_TT_ID = ? and CR_EX_ID = ? and CR_FROM_QTY <= ? and CR_TO_QTY >= ?
TradeOrder.getCompany: select CO_ID from COMPANY where CO_NAME = ?
TradeOrder.getCompany2: select CO_NAME from COMPANY where CO_ID = ?
TradeOrder.getCustomer: select C_F_NAME, C_L_NAME, C_TIER, C_TAX_ID from CUSTOMER where C_ID = ?
TradeOrder.getHoldingAsc: select H_QTY, H_PRICE from HOLDING where H_CA_ID = ? and H_S_SYMB = ? order by H_DTS asc
TradeOrder.getHoldingDesc: select H_QTY, H_PRICE from HOLDING where H_CA_ID = ? and H_S_SYMB = ? order by H_DTS desc
TradeOrder.getHoldingAssets: select sum(HS_QTY * LT_PRICE) from HOLDING_SUMMARY, LAST_TRADE where HS_CA_ID = ? and LT_S_SYMB = HS_S_SYMB
TradeOrder.getHoldingSummmary: select HS_QTY from HOLDING_SUMMARY where HS_CA_ID = ? and HS_S_SYMB = ?
TradeOrder.getLastTrade: select LT_PRICE from LAST_TRADE where LT_S_SYMB = ?
TradeOrder.getSecurity1: select S_EX_ID, S_NAME, S_SYMB from SECURITY where S_CO_ID = ? and S_ISSUE = ?
TradeOrder.getSecurity2: select S_CO_ID, S_EX_ID, S_NAME from SECURITY where S_SYMB = ?
TradeOrder.getTaxrate: select sum(TX_RATE) from TAXRATE, CUSTOMER_TAXRATE where TX_ID = CX_TX_ID and CX_C_ID = ?
TradeOrder.getTradeType: select TT_IS_MRKT, TT_IS_SELL from TRADE_TYPE where TT_ID = ?
TradeOrder.insertTrade: insert into TRADE(T_ID, T_DTS, T_ST_ID, T_TT_ID, T_IS_CASH, T_S_SYMB, T_QTY, T_BID_PRICE, T_CA_ID, T_EXEC_NAME, T_TRADE_PRICE, T_CHRG, T_COMM, T_TAX, T_LIFO) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
TradeOrder.insertTradeHistory: insert into TRADE_HISTORY(TH_T_ID, TH_DTS, TH_ST_ID) values (?, ?, ?)
TradeOrder.insertTradeRequest: insert into TRADE_REQUEST (TR_T_ID, TR_TT_ID, TR_S_SYMB, TR_QTY, TR_BID_PRICE, TR_CA_ID) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

TradeLookup.getCash: select CT_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(ct_dts, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), CT_NAME from CASH_TRANSACTION where CT_T_ID = ?
TradeLookup.getHoldingHistory: SELECT h1.hh_h_t_id, h1.hh_t_id, h1.hh_before_qty, h1.hh_after_qty from HOLDING_HISTORY where HH_H_T_ID = HH_T_ID and HH_T_ID = ?
TradeLookup.getSettlement: select SE_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(se_cash_due_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), SE_CASH_TYPE from SETTLEMENT where SE_T_ID = ?
TradeLookup.getTradeHistory: select DATE_FORMAT(th_dts, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), TH_ST_ID from TRADE_HISTORY where TH_T_ID = ? order by TH_DTS
TradeLookup.getTrade_frame1: select T_BID_PRICE, T_EXEC_NAME, T_IS_CASH, TT_IS_MRKT, T_TRADE_PRICE from TRADE, TRADE_TYPE where T_ID = ? and T_TT_ID = TT_ID
TradeLookup.getTrade_frame2: select T_BID_PRICE, T_EXEC_NAME, T_IS_CASH, T_ID, T_TRADE_PRICE from TRADE where T_CA_ID = ? and T_DTS >= ? and T_DTS <= ? order by T_DTS asc limit 20
TradeLookup.getTrade_frame3: SELECT t_ca_id, t_exec_name, t_is_cash, t_trade_price, t_qty, DATE_FORMAT(t_dts, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), t_id, t_tt_id FROM trade WHERE t_s_symb = ? AND t_dts >= ? AND t_dts <= ? ORDER BY t_dts LIMIT ?
TradeLookup.getTrade_frame4: select T_ID from TRADE where T_CA_ID = ? and T_DTS >= ? order by T_DTS asc limit 1

TradeResult.deleteHoldingSummary: delete from HOLDING_SUMMARY where HS_CA_ID = ? and HS_S_SYMB = ?
TradeResult.getCommissionRate: select CR_RATE from COMMISSION_RATE where CR_C_TIER = ? and CR_TT_ID = ? and CR_EX_ID = ? and CR_FROM_QTY <= ? and CR_TO_QTY >= ? limit 1
TradeResult.getCustomer: select C_TIER from CUSTOMER where C_ID = ?
TradeResult.getCustomerAccount: select CA_B_ID, CA_C_ID, CA_TAX_ST from CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT where CA_ID = ?
TradeResult.getCustomerAccountBalance: select ca_bal from CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT where CA_ID = ?
TradeResult.getHoldingAsc: select H_T_ID, H_QTY, H_PRICE from HOLDING where H_CA_ID = ? and H_S_SYMB = ? order by H_DTS asc
TradeResult.getHoldingDesc: select H_T_ID, H_QTY, H_PRICE from HOLDING where H_CA_ID = ? and H_S_SYMB = ? order by H_DTS desc
TradeResult.getHoldingSummary: select HS_QTY from HOLDING_SUMMARY where HS_CA_ID = ? and HS_S_SYMB = ?
TradeResult.getSecurity: select S_EX_ID, S_NAME from SECURITY where S_SYMB = ?
TradeResult.getTaxrate: select sum(TX_RATE) from TAXRATE, CUSTOMER_TAXRATE where TX_ID = CX_TX_ID and CX_TX_ID = ?
TradeResult.getTrade: select T_CA_ID, T_TT_ID, T_S_SYMB, T_QTY, T_CHRG, T_LIFO, T_IS_CASH from TRADE where T_ID = ?
TradeResult.getTradeType: select TT_NAME, TT_IS_SELL, TT_IS_MRKT from TRADE_TYPE where TT_ID = ?
TradeResult.insertCashTransaction: insert into CASH_TRANSACTION (CT_DTS, CT_T_ID, CT_AMT, CT_NAME) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
TradeResult.insertHolding: insert into HOLDING(H_T_ID, H_CA_ID, H_S_SYMB, H_DTS, H_PRICE, H_QTY) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
TradeResult.insertHoldingHistory: insert into HOLDING_HISTORY (HH_H_T_ID, HH_T_ID, HH_BEFORE_QTY, HH_AFTER_QTY) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
TradeResult.insertHoldingSummary: insert into HOLDING_SUMMARY(HS_CA_ID, HS_S_SYMB, HS_QTY) values (?, ?, ?)
TradeResult.insertSettlement: insert into SETTLEMENT (SE_T_ID, SE_CASH_TYPE, SE_CASH_DUE_DATE, SE_AMT) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
TradeResult.insertTradeHistory: insert into TRADE_HISTORY (TH_T_ID, TH_DTS, TH_ST_ID) values (?, ?, ?)
TradeResult.updateBroker: update BROKER set B_COMM_TOTAL = B_COMM_TOTAL + ?, B_NUM_TRADES = B_NUM_TRADES + 1 where B_ID = ?
TradeResult.updateCustomerAccount: update CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT set CA_BAL = CA_BAL+? where CA_ID = ?
TradeResult.updateHoldingSummary: update HOLDING_SUMMARY set HS_QTY = ? where HS_CA_ID = ? and HS_S_SYMB = ?
TradeResult.updateHolding: UPDATE holding SET h_qty = ? WHERE h_t_id = ?
TradeResult.updateTrade1: update TRADE set T_TAX = ? where T_ID = ?
TradeResult.updateTrade2: update TRADE set T_COMM = ?, T_DTS = ?, T_ST_ID = ?, T_TRADE_PRICE = ? where T_ID = ?

TradeUpdate.getCTName: select CT_NAME from CASH_TRANSACTION where CT_T_ID = ?
TradeUpdate.getCashTransaction: select CT_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(ct_dts, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), CT_NAME from CASH_TRANSACTION where CT_T_ID = ?
TradeUpdate.getCashType: select SE_CASH_TYPE from SETTLEMENT where SE_T_ID = ?
TradeUpdate.getSettlement: select SE_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(se_cash_due_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), SE_CASH_TYPE from SETTLEMENT where SE_T_ID = ?
TradeUpdate.getTrade1: select T_EXEC_NAME from TRADE where T_ID = ?
TradeUpdate.getTrade2: select T_BID_PRICE, T_EXEC_NAME, T_IS_CASH, T_ID, T_TRADE_PRICE from TRADE where T_CA_ID = ? and T_ST_ID = ? and T_DTS >= ? and T_DTS <= ? order by T_DTS asc limit 20
TradeUpdate.getTradeNoSTID: select T_BID_PRICE, T_EXEC_NAME, T_IS_CASH, T_ID, T_TRADE_PRICE from TRADE where T_CA_ID = ? and T_DTS >= ? and T_DTS <= ? order by T_DTS asc limit 20
TradeUpdate.getTradeHistory: select TH_DTS, TH_ST_ID from TRADE_HISTORY where TH_T_ID = ? order by TH_DTS
TradeUpdate.getTradeHistoryAsc: select DATE_FORMAT(th_dts, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), th_st_id  from TRADE_HISTORY where TH_T_ID = ? order by TH_DTS asc
TradeUpdate.getTradeTradeType: select T_BID_PRICE, T_EXEC_NAME, T_IS_CASH, TT_IS_MRKT, T_TRADE_PRICE from TRADE, TRADE_TYPE where T_ID = ? and T_TT_ID = TT_ID
TradeUpdate.getTradeTradeTypeSecurity: select T_CA_ID, T_EXEC_NAME, T_IS_CASH, T_TRADE_PRICE, T_QTY, TT_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(t_dts, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), T_ID, T_TT_ID, TT_NAME from TRADE, TRADE_TYPE, SECURITY where T_S_SYMB = ? and T_ST_ID = ? and T_DTS >= ? and T_DTS <= ? and TT_ID = T_TT_ID and S_SYMB = T_S_SYMB order by T_DTS asc limit 20
TradeUpdate.updateCTName: update CASH_TRANSACTION set CT_NAME = ? where CT_T_ID = ?
TradeUpdate.updateSettlement: update SETTLEMENT SET SE_CASH_TYPE = ? where SE_T_ID = ?
TradeUpdate.updateTrade: update TRADE set T_EXEC_NAME = ? where T_ID = ?

TradeStatus.getName: select C_L_NAME, C_F_NAME, B_NAME from CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT, CUSTOMER, BROKER where CA_ID = ? and C_ID = CA_C_ID and B_ID = CA_B_ID
TradeStatus.getTradeStatus: select T_ID, DATE_FORMAT(t_dts,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), ST_NAME, TT_NAME, T_S_SYMB, T_QTY, T_EXEC_NAME, T_CHRG, S_NAME, EX_NAME   FROM TRADE, STATUS_TYPE, TRADE_TYPE, SECURITY, EXCHANGE  WHERE T_CA_ID = ?    AND ST_ID = T_ST_ID    AND TT_ID = T_TT_ID    AND S_SYMB = T_S_SYMB    AND EX_ID = S_EX_ID  ORDER BY T_DTS DESC LIMIT 50

CustomerPosition.getAssets: select CA_ID, CA_BAL from CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT left outer join HOLDING_SUMMARY on HS_CA_ID = CA_ID, LAST_TRADE where CA_C_ID = ? and LT_S_SYMB = HS_S_SYMB group by CA_ID,CA_BAL  limit 10
CustomerPosition.getCID: select C_ID from CUSTOMER where C_TAX_ID = ?
CustomerPosition.getCustomer: select C_ST_ID, C_L_NAME, C_F_NAME, C_M_NAME, C_GNDR, C_TIER, C_DOB, C_AD_ID, C_CTRY_1, C_AREA_1, C_LOCAL_1, C_EXT_1, C_CTRY_2, C_AREA_2, C_LOCAL_2, C_EXT_2, C_CTRY_3, C_AREA_3, C_LOCAL_3, C_EXT_3, C_EMAIL_1, C_EMAIL_2 from CUSTOMER where C_ID = ?
CustomerPosition.getTradeHistory: SELECT t_id, t_s_symb, t_qty, st_name, th_dts FROM trade, trade_history, status_type WHERE t_id = ? AND th_t_id = t_id AND st_id = th_st_id ORDER BY th_dts DESC LIMIT 10
CustomerPosition.getTrades: SELECT t_id AS id FROM trade WHERE t_ca_id = ? ORDER BY t_dts DESC LIMIT 10

MarketFeed.deleteTradeRequest: delete from TRADE_REQUEST where TR_T_ID = ? and TR_BID_PRICE = ? and TR_TT_ID = ? and TR_QTY = ?
MarketFeed.getRequestList: select TR_T_ID, TR_BID_PRICE, TR_TT_ID, TR_QTY from TRADE_REQUEST where TR_S_SYMB = ? and ((TR_TT_ID = ? and TR_BID_PRICE >= ?) or (TR_TT_ID = ? and TR_BID_PRICE <= ?) or (TR_TT_ID = ? and TR_BID_PRICE >= ?))
MarketFeed.insertTradeHistory: insert into TRADE_HISTORY (TH_T_ID, TH_DTS, TH_ST_ID) values (?, ?, ?)
MarketFeed.updateLastTrade: update LAST_TRADE set LT_PRICE = ?, LT_VOL = LT_VOL + ?, LT_DTS = ? where LT_S_SYMB = ?
MarketFeed.updateTrade: update TRADE set T_DTS = ?, T_ST_ID = ? where T_ID = ?

MarketWatch.getNewPrice: select LT_PRICE from LAST_TRADE where LT_S_SYMB = ?
MarketWatch.getNumOut: select S_NUM_OUT from SECURITY where S_SYMB = ?
MarketWatch.getOldPrice: select DM_CLOSE from DAILY_MARKET where DM_S_SYMB = ? order by DM_DATE desc limit 1
MarketWatch.getStockListCustomer: select WI_S_SYMB from WATCH_ITEM, WATCH_LIST where wl_c_id = ? AND wi_wl_id = wl_id ORDER BY wi_s_symb ASC LIMIT 1
MarketWatch.getStockListIndustry: select S_SYMB from INDUSTRY, COMPANY, SECURITY where IN_NAME = ? and CO_IN_ID = IN_ID and S_CO_ID = CO_ID and CO_ID >= ? AND CO_ID <= ?
MarketWatch.getStockListCustomerAccount: select HS_S_SYMB from HOLDING_SUMMARY where HS_CA_ID = ?

SecurityDetail.getInfo1: select S_NAME, CO_ID, CO_NAME, CO_SP_RATE, CO_CEO, CO_DESC, CO_OPEN_DATE, CO_ST_ID, CA.AD_LINE1, CA.AD_LINE2, ZCA.ZC_TOWN, ZCA.ZC_DIV, CA.AD_ZC_CODE, CA.AD_CTRY, S_NUM_OUT, S_START_DATE, S_EXCH_DATE, S_PE, S_52WK_HIGH, S_52WK_HIGH_DATE, S_52WK_LOW, S_52WK_LOW_DATE, S_DIVIDEND, S_YIELD, ZEA.ZC_DIV, EA.AD_CTRY, EA.AD_LINE1, EA.AD_LINE2, ZEA.ZC_TOWN, EA.AD_ZC_CODE, EX_CLOSE, EX_DESC, EX_NAME, EX_NUM_SYMB, EX_OPEN FROM SECURITY, COMPANY, ADDRESS AS CA, ADDRESS AS EA, ZIP_CODE AS ZCA,  ZIP_CODE AS ZEA, EXCHANGE WHERE S_SYMB = ? and CO_ID = S_CO_ID and CA.AD_ID = CO_AD_ID AND EA.AD_ID = EX_AD_ID AND EX_ID = S_EX_ID AND CA.AD_ZC_CODE = ZCA.ZC_CODE AND EA.AD_ZC_CODE = ZEA.ZC_CODE
SecurityDetail.getInfo2: select CO_NAME, IN_NAME from COMPANY_COMPETITOR, COMPANY, INDUSTRY where CP_CO_ID = ? and CO_ID = CP_COMP_CO_ID and IN_ID = CP_IN_ID limit 3
SecurityDetail.getInfo3: select FI_YEAR, FI_QTR, FI_QTR_START_DATE, FI_REVENUE, FI_NET_EARN, FI_BASIC_EPS, FI_DILUT_EPS, FI_MARGIN, FI_INVENTORY, FI_ASSETS, FI_LIABILITY, FI_OUT_BASIC, FI_OUT_DILUT from FINANCIAL where FI_CO_ID = ? order by FI_YEAR asc, FI_QTR limit 20
SecurityDetail.getInfo4: select DATE_FORMAT(dm_date,'%Y-%m-%d'), DM_CLOSE, DM_HIGH, DM_LOW, DM_VOL from DAILY_MARKET where DM_S_SYMB = ? and DM_DATE >= ? order by DM_DATE asc limit 20
SecurityDetail.getInfo5: select LT_PRICE, LT_OPEN_PRICE, LT_VOL from LAST_TRADE where LT_S_SYMB = ?
SecurityDetail.getInfo6: SELECT ni_item, DATE_FORMAT(ni_dts, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), ni_source, ni_author FROM news_xref, news_item WHERE  ni_id = nx_ni_id AND nx_co_id = ? LIMIT ?
SecurityDetail.getInfo7: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ni_dts, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f'), ni_source, ni_author, ni_headline, ni_summary FROM news_xref, news_item WHERE ni_id = nx_ni_id AND nx_co_id = ? LIMIT ?

BrokerVolume.get: select B_NAME, sum(TR_QTY * TR_BID_PRICE) from TRADE_REQUEST, SECTOR, INDUSTRY, COMPANY, BROKER, SECURITY where TR_S_SYMB = S_SYMB and S_CO_ID = CO_ID and CO_IN_ID = IN_ID and SC_ID = IN_SC_ID and B_NAME IN ? and SC_NAME = ? group by B_NAME
